website_summaries.verdict: A great option if you're interested in boosting your collagen levels as well as your protein intake.
pros: Comes in chocolate and unflavored varieties
Contains amino acids and collagen peptides to help your skin, hair, and nails
cons: Only contains 14 g of protein per serving
This powder may not dissolve completely in liquid

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my diet
customer_reviews.text: Thought that I'd try out Bone Broth + Collagen Protein, and I'm glad that I did. I have some pretty severe intestinal issues, and I often cannot eat many foods without having some sort of irritation, so I was a little bit concerned as to whether or not this product would give me problems. I'm happy to say that I have no issues with this product, and, in fact, it seems to be very easy on my digestive system. I like the fact that it does not have fillers in it. It's just pure ingredients, and I do best with those kind of products. Will keep ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Granade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent source of energy, clarity of mind and overall well being. I put it in my coffee in the morning and it does not change the taste. This product is so good I give it to our senior dogs in their food everyday and it has helped with their overall strength, energy and fitness. I highly recommend this product. We signed this product up on the subscribe and save program through Amazon so we get it monthly. We consider it an essential supplement for our healthy well being.
customer_reviews.author: A H Parks

customer_reviews.title: I didn't think I'd miss it until I forgot it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this a few week. It didn't taste bad and mixes in pretty well too things. Ib like almond milk. I didn't notice overnight improvement BUT I forgot to take it 2 days and I realized how much better it had been making my wrist and elbow feel. I didn't realize the dull ache and numbness was gone until I forgot to take it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenaleww

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I started using it just a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I started using it just a few days ago and I noticed my nails are looking stronger. Taste is neutral and easy to mix, I add it to my golden milk, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jeniffer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Ingredients & Easy on The System❤️
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS SUPPLEMENT ❤️❤️I Thought that I would try out Bone Broth + Collagen Protein, and I'm so HAPPY!!!😀😀 I have some pretty severe intestinal issues, including Celiac Disease and I often cannot eat many foods without having some sort of irritation, so I was a little bit concerned as to whether or not this product would give me problems. I'm SUPER happy to report that I have no issues with this product, and, in fact, it seems to be very easy on my digestive system. I ❤️ the fact that it does not have fillers in it. It's just pure ingredients, and I do best with those kind of products. Will keep ordering. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Will not dissolve so it goes in the garbage
customer_reviews.text: My wife had used Dr. Ax products but I found this for her. She hates that it clumps up and does not dissolve. She has to go to work early and has no time to stand around stirring this stuff. She adds it to coffee or hot tea, stirs it and then spoons out the clumps floating on top which is also time consuming. She asked me not to buy it again. So regardless of ingredient quality, taste, health benefits, etc., it is a waste of money if it doesn't dissolve and gets thrown in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Will write better review after a couple wks but have been taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Will write better review after a couple wks but have been taking collagen in my coffee a couple months & really helped my arthritis in my fingers. Decided to try WTH bone broth so hopefully will be same. Stir & w/in minutes will all be dissolved! No taste. Unfortunately since stopping peptide collagen & doing this, hair is falling out & nails chipping off since taking this. Going back to peptide collagen. Both helped my arthritis tho.
customer_reviews.author: snewcombs

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a bony taste - ON THE CONTRARY!!!
customer_reviews.text: When you think, "bone broth" you're probably thinking of a meaty dark color and taste. This was a welcomed shut down of that notion! This product is a white powder that easily dissolves in to what you're adding it to (for me, it's coffee) and, if anything, it improves the taste - like a creamer! I add one to two scoops in my morning coffee and am getting the benefits of the collagen without the funky aftertaste. I am picky about what I put in my coffee and have no issues with highly recommending this product to someone looking for a clean way to get in healthy collagen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bone broth that I don’t have to make!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking collagen for years and when I discovered this blend, I was thrilled! Heard about the benefits of bone broth, but don’t have the hours it takes to make quality broth. This has all that I am looking for....so happy! Just have to get over the idea of adding this to my coffee every morning, yuck you say, you don’t taste it, really! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Essly Powell

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of side affects
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product because I saw a show on PBS about the benefits of both Collagen and both broth. Here’s my experience in a nut shell. I immediately showed signs of a lot of energy and glowing skin but after about two weeks of taking it I notice that it made my stomach very upset, bloating, diarrhea and nausea... Therefore, I decided to stop taking the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!! No taste or aftertaste!
customer_reviews.text: This is something that I hope to continue using as it gives me a natural burst of daily energy to get by, especially as I fight autoimmune diseases, chronic fatigue and pain every day. I am impressed by how good this tastes once mixed into juice, the fact that I don’t have to force myself to drink it like I’ve had to with other protein and body drink aids.
customer_reviews.author: Kivuvu83

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a FLAVORLESS Bone Broth Powder!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from including all 3 collagen types, and it's from grass-fed sources, the Peak Performance brand is superior to other brands I've tried because of its ability to formulate a flavorless powder. Other brands I've tried have had an unpleasant taste, but this is the first brand I've tried that is actually palatable. I would recommend this product to friends, and I will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless, Pasture Raised/Grass Fed, 3rd Party Tested/Verified
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it’s got all 3 collagen types and is unflavored, making it easy to add to smoothies, puddings, yogurt, etc. The brand is eco-friendly and promotes sustainable farming practices. Since the cows are pasture raised and grass-fed, the omega profile is much better along with there being twice as much CLA. Sale price was a great deal at over half off.
customer_reviews.author: Virtually Yours

customer_reviews.title: not for my  coffee
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy different kind collagen , but first time this brand , I always mix it with morning coffee and its great flavor , but with this brand when I mix it with my coffee I couldn't drink it at all , I tried again and again but couldn't drink it , im sure its a good product u may use it on ur food or soup but not coffee , so im going to order me a different brand for my morning coffee , not sure if I want to keep this or return it yet , but I wont be ordering again not for my coffee
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it dissolves easily and, therefore, has no lumps. I have noticed that my fingernails are much stronger. I have always had thin, brittle nails, which were difficult to keep long and manicured. I, now, have long nails, longer than in the past. My skin is more hydrated also. I would highly recommend purchasing this product. I will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... usually make my own bone broth but wanted a good powder bone broth for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I usually make my own bone broth but wanted a good powder bone broth for traveling. This product will be great for that purpose but like most of these powder forms the taste is not the best. I have found adding nutritional yeast, sea salt, black pepper and turmeric helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it has bone broth and collagen. Mixes well if I use a fork to wisk it in warm water for a few seconds until the clumps are gone. Since taking collagen I've noticed increased energy, skin is more hydrated and cellulite has decreased. I'm sure there are other benefits as well and so I take this every morning.
customer_reviews.author: margarita s.

customer_reviews.title: Great skin enhancer
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product monthly and the results are amazing. My hair and nails are growing and much stronger. The skin on my chest is no longer wrinkly when I get up in the morning (side sleeper) and my skin in general looks healthier. I drink the bone broth in my coffee every morning. Highly recommend this product. Ive told all my friends about it and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Taste of bone broth very overwhelming.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it would be such an overpowering bone broth taste. Wasn't sure what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dloftin

customer_reviews.title: Great Collagen
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a half of dozen different Collagen's out there and this is the best! I put this in my bullet proof coffee very morning, and even though all them make the coffee look like a latte, with the other ones you lose the latte taste after you drink the foam, but with this one, the latte taste is there through the whole drink.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Great for healthy hair!
customer_reviews.text: I’m this to my bulletproof coffee in the morning. There is no taste and it adds a creaminess to the coffee. I’ve been using it for about 3 weeks now and I can actually feel a noticeable difference in my hair. It feels a bit thicker and looks healthier. Not a noticeable difference in my skin yet but overall I’m happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Hype
customer_reviews.text: I contemplated adding bone broth to my diet for a long time. I am so happy that I purchased this product! It lived up to what it claimed. I have severe pain in my knees. Within 48 hours, I noticed a significant decrease in the pain that I had been experiencing. A few days later, I stopped crawling up my stairs. The consistency of the product makes it easy to blend into your favorite drink. I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for something to ease the pain and inflammation in their joints. It has become a very important part of my regiment.
customer_reviews.author: G. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT unflavored
customer_reviews.text: I mix with white coffee (very mild almost tea like for flavor) and the taste resembles beef bone broth. Not my favorite taste in the world, however this is an amazing product and mixed in a smoothie the beefy taste is not as potent. Outside of the flavor, I love this product and will continue use.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Rion Collier

customer_reviews.title: Gives Me the Runs
customer_reviews.text: I've used Bone Broth and Collagen before, separately, different company, and felt fine. But this product gives me loose diarrhea type stool. Even tho I started out only using half the recommended amount, and tried it a few more times only using half a scoop. Same result every time. Too bad I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Oceanlight

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for skin and joints! Increased mobility, energy and clarity. Not all the bloat and side effects of all the popular protein brands. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn27

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN PROTEIN
customer_reviews.text: I'm Sooo happy with this product!!! CLEAN No junk in here, just pure grass fed bone broth & & collagen, no added sweetners or flavors. This is the Real Deal!!! STOKED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suz e.

customer_reviews.title: It is great to use after workout !!
customer_reviews.text: This hydrolyzed Bone broth is an excellent source of Protein and Collagen. I like it very much that is Grass Fed, Paleo and Keto Friendly, Non GMO, and Gluten free. I am recommending all my gym friends to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my morning coffee and it's perfect! It thickens my coffee a little bit, but it just makes it better. It doesn't have any taste and it blends extremely well into my drink. It might be my imagination but I do think it's already making my joints feel a little bit better and my skin look better too!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive stomache
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and will continue using it because i feel my skin looks better. However, my only 2 draw backs are: - it has a smell and changed my coffee taste, the only way I take it is to blend it with fruits to take that smell away. - for me, it causes stomach gas so I don't really use the full scoop.
customer_reviews.author: DonzDonz

customer_reviews.title: Causes bloating & gas
customer_reviews.text: Using a magic bullet to blend product sticks to the side of the blender. The longer I use this the more bloated & gassy I become which defeats the purpose of wanting to slim down. After using for 3 months now I am switching to something with higher quality control because this product clearly has an ingredient in it that causes bloating & gas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's so sticky and floats to the top
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for awhile but am looking for something else. I add it to my coffee every morning but no matter how I do it, it rises to the top and refuses to mix in very well. I stir and stir it, I put it in the microwave for 30 seconds hoping it will melt, but it ends up being lumps of this sticky goo on top. I end up chewing them up, but it's too gross. I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste
customer_reviews.text: This product smells terrible. I’m not sure if it tasted bad, but the smell was overwhelming. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C Macedo

customer_reviews.title: Good collagen powder weird smell and taste
customer_reviews.text: Weird taste and smell But great benefits for joints and skin I have seen Mix it with really hot liquid. Otherwise it will Clump If it clumps mix it in your NutriBullet or blender
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Strong taste and smell...
customer_reviews.text: This product has a strong flavor and smell. I can’t believe this company says the product is tasteless! The only drink I can mix it with is my coffee but even then it has a slight taste and strong smell. I’ve only been using for a few days, hopefully the company wasn’t as dishonest about the health benefits of there product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Tates like dead cow
customer_reviews.text: Hot dead cow smell and taste. I couldn’t bear drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: CardenasHome

customer_reviews.title: Part of my daily routine
customer_reviews.text: I have at least one cup a day, I have mine with tea and love it. I personally find it mixes very well with hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia A. Augeri

customer_reviews.title: Does not blend into drink
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product 2 stars because it is almost truly unflavored (it only slightly changes the flavor of whatever I’m drinking). I will not be purchasing this product again as it does not blend/ dissolve. Instead it turns into many little powder balls in my drink. I have tried many different ways to shake/ blend it without success, even using a blender bottle this stays as little balls.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Owens

customer_reviews.title: Saw no diff
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t see much difference in my face or my nails. I came across a reading and it read that bone broth is not always good for you but do your own investigation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rip off container is not fully fill
customer_reviews.text: i was disappointed to see how the bottle was half empty when i got it! very disappointed! there is a weird taste! can’t say if it’s doing it’s effects yet because just started! i do feel we’re being cheated, container is not full! if you pay we at least should get a full container of powder !! such a rip off not happy !!
customer_reviews.author: mybeautyamorr

customer_reviews.title: I like this product.
customer_reviews.text: Tasteless blends well in my coffee. My first time using last month will write more reviews as I use up my 2nd canister. So far so good. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Harper

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my joint pain
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mix, no taste, keeps my bones and hip joints from hurting like they used to before.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: super foamy
customer_reviews.text: I like it because of all the properties it has, but it is foamy. I have to use a spoon after drinking it to get the foam out. Yes, I do choke down the foam. I will continue to use it however because of all the properties that it has.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought it because of gut issues, but the taste and smell are horrible. Even mixed with coffee she still can feel them. I don't think she'll be able to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how thurs product is supposed to relieve pain? But it is an amazing supplement. Can't taste it in my black coffee. I use it for Keto and IF. Great for skin, so I'm hoping great for tendons and ligaments.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement
customer_reviews.text: Only been using a couple months but have noticed nails are less brittle and smother
customer_reviews.author: MichaelO

customer_reviews.title: Not very good consitency
customer_reviews.text: The consistency is not very good in comparison to the other bonebroths+collagen that I have used. I wanted to give this brand a try but I did not like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bates

customer_reviews.title: I love this broth
customer_reviews.text: I love this broth. Add a pinch of celtic sea salt and this is a great protein boost to replace a night-time cup of tea. Does require a bit of whisking to homogenize the powder with water (even hot water), so if it gets frothy then you're doing it right.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Smith

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this a 3 stars because I’ve tried others and this has been by far the harsher to drink of the rest as well as clumpy. I will continue to take till it’s gone though. Not sure if I’ll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of jot or cold water, blending in a bottle and shaking in a bottle is not possible.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to mix without the need to place in blender. Also, the description does not indicate whether or not the product has grams of sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Ehle

customer_reviews.title: Twice the benefits!
customer_reviews.text: I compared this product with many others I have tried and was surprised to see the amino acid amounts were at least double of what I was currently using. No taste, easy to mix and twice the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the person
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for two months now and I can’t stand the taste. That is just me. Does not mix well
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: My morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I mix it in my coffee in the mornings. The trick to getting it to mix well is to place the powder in first then the liquid or in my case my coffee and stir it up. Also I use a flavored coffee creamer like vanilla or almond milk and you can’t taste the bone broth flavor at all. I love it. I hope this method helps others.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: I bought this collagen supplement because it contains all 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collagen supplement because it contains all 3 types of collagen. Unfortunately, it clumps very badly in my protein shakes. It is going in the trash because it is not useable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kelliher

customer_reviews.title: You don't get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed and deeply dissatisfied. First time ordering this supplement, and certainly did not get what I paid for. You'd think after spending nearly $40, the container would be full. There was at least 2inches of powder missing from the container. I will be willing to change this review after this problem is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Balint

customer_reviews.title: The fine powder is very messy
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to dissolve in cold or hot liquid and very lumpy. The fine powder is very messy. Taste is ok but I would not add it to my coffee. Been taken it for about a week and can't tell if it work or not. I probably will not buy it again because it takes forever to dissolve,
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.text: It has no taste. I put it in my coffee in the mornings. It seems to suppress my appetite during the day. It doesn't mix well in cold drinks. In warm drinks, it clumps but its tolerable for me. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Divinely Purposed Deals

customer_reviews.title: My hair stopped falling out
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product because people recommended it. I like to make it hot with chicken broth. Can’t taste it at all when I make it that way. I’ve noticed my hair is done falling out after taking it for about two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Abbye S.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Though a bit pricey, this stuff is great in that you can mix it with anything and it adds protein without any unpleasant flavor or texture. Just a great dietary supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Science fan

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Live that it contains all types of collagen and it grassfed

customer_reviews.title: Does not dissolve very well

customer_reviews.title: I love that this bone broth mixes and dissolves very well ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this bone broth mixes and dissolves very well in everything I add it to. The three types of collagen is amazing, I have lines above my lip from using straws and the collagen is gradually filling them in! I persuaded some friends of mine to try it and they like it as much as I do.

customer_reviews.title: Great “two-fer “ product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product does double duty and I can get my collagen and bone broth benefits in one supplement vs two separate ones

customer_reviews.title: Great all natural
customer_reviews.text: I love this all natural product! I feel great putting this in my body and I start my day off right.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality product. Haven't noticed the health benefits yet but will keep taking it to give it more time and see.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste & smell
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have been able to tolerate the taste and smell of this product but it was aweful! I couldn't even force myself to drink one cup of this. Do not waste your money

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely worth the money. It's a good brand and it doesn't taste terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes terrible! I've been mixing it with different drinks to try and mask the terrible taste, but it doesn't seem to help. I will not order this again.

customer_reviews.title: This is very good for my bones, my skin and some digestive issues.
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor after I put a little salt and some black pepper. The smell is not pleasant at first but after 3- 4 minutes I didn't noticed.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so far, you can put it in any beverage you want its quick and easy, it takes some mixing for the powder to dissolve but i notice i mixes better in hot water i like to mix it in my tea 🍵 😊nothing crazy also i love that they donate to children in need💖 cant wait to see my results!

customer_reviews.title: What has changed?
customer_reviews.text: I’m concerned with the consistency of the powder. Something has changed. It dissolves immediately whereas previously there’s been a lot of clumping until dissolved. What has been added or removed? I have 2 containers now with this same new consistency.

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, no taste and most importantly there are no fillers

customer_reviews.text: It works extremely well. I stir it in warm water so it doesn’t dissolve super well. But I love what it does for my skin!!

customer_reviews.text: Good product. It easily mixes with just about anything. Good quality protein supplement.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I add it to my coffee, doesn't change the taste, Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I use it for my keto coffee and you can’t even tell it’s in there and I feel so much better it has helped my leaky gut.

customer_reviews.title: Read Your Labels
customer_reviews.text: Great product but first container only had 20 servings — weird. However, my 2nd order has 30 servings in the container. I just wish they’d package in bags instead of plastic. #superexcited #greatproduct

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great with my coffee. I get added protein to my day through what I already drink

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend buying this product

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again

customer_reviews.text: I used it for stomach pain. Within two days it made drastic changes in leaky gut I have a four month supply and plan on never having to go without it!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Thus Collagen did not mix well in hot or cold water, it feel into clumps which could not be ingested!

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This product started working right away. It's working for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Informed Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best broth.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bone broth. Tried another and my knee and hip started hurting again. Went back to this and the pain went away.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnes Kessler

customer_reviews.title: I received the product unsealed.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to receive the product unsealed. The seal under the cap was open and the powdered broth was all over. Not sure if it is safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Would be great for smoothies, not coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea that this contains bone broth plus collagen protein and all 3 collagen types, however this does not dissolve well. I've tried hot water, warm water, room temp, and cold water. It doesn't matter the temp, it just is a clumping sticky mess. Even using an immersion blender, it sticks to the blender and is a lot of effort to blend in completely. If you're getting this to add to smoothies it would be great. I like the concept but I don't have the time or patience to work it into my coffee which is how I incorporate collagen.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves in only very hot liquid
customer_reviews.text: Product has no taste but doesn’t dissolve very well unless water/drink is very very hot....
customer_reviews.author: Donna F.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept and am curious to try the powered kind, instead of pills
customer_reviews.author: Emma Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, doesn’t dissolve well even in hot liquids and not happy with the taste
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Not sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Product not sealed. Not safe to use in my opinion. Will not be buying product again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua E Hazeldean

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. Healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Over all gut health and is great for hair, skin & Nails. I use it in my morning shakes or soups.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not dissolve well
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad taste but does not dissolve well. Clumps up.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: All natural, mixed perfect everytime. Best on the market, period!
customer_reviews.author: JML

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Tasteless and is amazing in smoothies! I was told about this product from Tracey Bellion!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Estes

product_meta.title: Hydrolyzed Bone Broth and Collagen Unflavored Protein Peptides Powder by Peak Performance. Contains All Collagen Types: 1, 2, and 3. Pure Pasture, Raised Grass Fed, Paleo Friendly, Gluten + Dairy Free
product_meta.description:
WHY BONE BROTH + COLLAGEN? 

 Bone Broth, derived from REAL food sources, is considered to be one of the most ancient and remarkable nutritional substances and best source of natural collagen in the world. Everything that connects our body, keeping skin tone and joints strong, needs collagen. Collagen protein is different than whey and casein protein because of its high levels of amino acids. 

 DON’T BE FOOLED:

 Not all collagen supplements are created equal, whether advertized as collagen peptides or collagen hydrolysate. In fact, most rely on just a single source of collagen. Until now. Introducing Peak Performance’s ultimate blend of Bone Broth + Collagen with types I & III collagen for hair, skin, nails, muscles and bone support. PLUS type II collagen for joint and cartilage support, gut and healthy immune function.

 OUR GUARANTEE:

 Recent testing reveals popular collagen and bone broth products contain a number of potentially hazardous contaminants, including antibiotics, parabens and more. 

With a trusted brand like Peak Performance, you are GUARANTEED the highest quality Bone Broth + Collagen from pure, pasture-raised, grass-fed cows. Our Supplement contains no antibiotics or toxins and no artificial or refined sugars or fillers.

 Peak Performance Pure Pasture Raised Grass Fed Hydrolyzed Bone Broth + Collagen Protein is Paleo Friendly, GMO Free, Gluten Free, Soy Free and Dairy Free and is quick and easy to mix in hot & cold liquids: coffee, smoothies, soups etc. 

 This collagen protein is easily digestible, gut friendly and are made for women and men who are busy professionals, athletes, high performers and parents on the go. 

 Mixes great with the Peak Performance High Altitude Organic Coffee.
feature_bullets: UNFLAVORED - CONTAINS ALL 3 TYPES OF COLLAGEN: I & III collagen for hair, skin, nails, muscles and bone support. PLUS type II collagen for joint and cartilage support, gut and healthy immune function. MORE PROTEIN PER SERVING than other leading brands! NUTRITION RICH WITH 19 OCCURRING AMINO ACIDS.

IMPORTANT - MOST SUPPLEMENTS ARE NOT 3RD PARTY TESTED! This is a dirty secret that many supplement companies don't want you to know that their products are NOT independently 3rd party tested outside of their own facilities. Why? Because it's an extra out of pocket expense to conduct 3rd party testing and most companies will not sacrifice their profit. But NOT us. Peak Performance is committed to the HIGHEST STANDARDS and this product is 3rd party tested to ensure it is 100% SAFE FOR YOU.

PURE GRASS FED HYDROLYZED - from pure, pasture-raised, grass-fed cows. Contains no antibiotics or growth hormones. No artificial or refined sugars or fillers. Paleo Friendly, GMO Free, Gluten Free, Soy Free and Dairy Free. Helps support optimal body metabolism, high energy levels, lean muscle tissue, strong bones, healthy joints, great looking skin and hair, improved brain health and more!

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEED. If you don’t absolutely LOVE this Peak Performance Bone Broth + Collagen Protein... For ANY reason whatsoever. Simply send us a message and we will be happy to offer you a fast, prompt refund. NO QUESTIONS ASKED. That’s how confident we are that you’ll love this product.

OVER 300,000 HAPPY CUSTOMERS + 1-FOR-1 DONATION TO VITAMINS ANGELS. Peak Performance is celebrating over 300,000 happy customers and we are also very proud of our 1-for-1 donation match program. For every unit you purchase, through our partnership with the nonprofit Vitamin Angels, we will supply a child at risk of malnutrition with vitamins for 1 year! So thank you for helping us continue this great cause!
